original: Kusalaṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
analyzed: kusalam pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca saṅkhitta hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate terasa

original: Kusalaṁ sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: kusalam sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi
analyzed: hetu paccayā pañca saṅkhitta hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi

original: Kusalaṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: kusalam upekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na upekkhā sahagataḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi
analyzed: hetu paccayā pañca saṅkhitta hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi
